country.remark-part-1: WIPO uses the code element "EA" to represent Eurasian Patent organization in its ST.3 standard without the consent of the ISO 3166/MA which in 1995 had set aside the code element "EV" for this purpose. In fact, "EA" has for a long time been reserved for customs purposes to represent Ceuta and Melilla (see Table 5) in the context of ISO 3166-1. So that the alpha-2 code element "EA" is now exceptionally reserved for WCO (World Customs Organization), and also used like an indeterminately reserved code element by WIPO.
